scripts.start-dev: echo - building, cleaning and starting && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start: echo - starting node runtime && cd build && node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/Index.js
scripts.compile: echo - compiling source && npm run clean && tsc --p tsconfig.json --diagnostics
scripts.build: echo - building && npm run compile && cp -f tsconfig.json build/tsconfig.json
scripts.init: echo - running full install and start procedure && npm i -D && start-dev
